meanings.definition: Unable to be justified or forgiven.
meanings.sent1: It is inexcusable to cheat on a test.
meanings.sent2: Lying to your parents is considered inexcusable behavior.
meanings.sent3: It would be inexcusable to wear a swimsuit to a formal event.
meanings.sent4: Her inexcusable tardiness cost her the job opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The inexcusable mistake led to a major setback.

meanings.sent1: His inexcusable actions hurt many people.
meanings.sent3: It's inexcusable to forget your best friend's birthday.
meanings.sent4: The inexcusable neglect of the project led to its failure.
meanings.sent5: The inexcusable behavior at the party caused a lot of drama.
